name: Inevitable
description:
A 48 hour game jam developed in Unity. Theme: Inevitability

Place tiles on the grid to prevent your tile holder from filling up. Tiles shoot balls in the direction the arrows point, breaking down tiles - plan your placements carefully in order to set up large chains to wipe the board clean. 

As you level up, the game speed increases and piece placement gets more difficult. With loss being inevitable, how far can you make it up the chain?


Controls

Left Click on an open grid spot to place the current tile.
Right Click to swap the current tile with the bottom tile in the stack.
(You can place tiles back to back, no need to wait for tiles to stop shooting)

Custom  graphics/code with SFX and music from https://gamesounds.xyz/.
Please Enjoy! 
- Kees Luyendijk
